Comment: "The ITU plan calls for all numbers to be exactly 9 digits. However, it's not clear if\nlocal dialing is still possible. We assume it is for now."

Comment: "The prefix 202[5-9] was added as per the ITU update on Oct. 2011. It is not\nmentioned in the new ITU docs but they are still valid based on online\nevidence."
